channel.title: Un-tradeable items (player to player trading) Demote (667 loadin 728)
channel.description:
Hey, i want to trade over some santa items like custom top and legs and some other items that are ''Destroyable'' and not drop able but it says i cant trade them over how can i fix this?
I can also not demote people when i setrights 2 on them any tips?

item.title: Un-tradeable items (player to player trading) Demote (667 loadin 728)
item.dc:creator: @darkzcap3 darkzcap3
item.description:
@darkzcap3 wrote:

ok, was in a hurry when i wrote the question, when i want to trade over items that are destroyable and not dropable i aint possible to trade them over to other people and was wondering if this is fixable or able to put into GE (using Zenith’s source) also ive tried to make one of my cousins admin whit just trying the ::setrights 2 (Name) but i cant take ::setrights 0 and ive fixed this somehow by fixing on a file on the server but i need to compile to make it work everythime i use setrights, i tried to make them admin to make them possible to spawn the items because we had a fun Dice game whit some Xmas items and such, this is just a server me and my cousins play on (A bit sad that people cant buy Anchor and such because its glitched in shop and its ‘‘destroy’’ able item when u trying to trade over that makes it Non-tradeable or dropable for them to pickup) so easy question here:

How can i fix that i can take ::setrights 0 (when i try i get you lower rites ;P)
and make Non-tradeable items Tradeable.

Read full topic
item.source: Un-tradeable items (player to player trading) Demote (667 loadin 728)

item.title: Un-tradeable items (player to player trading) Demote (667 loadin 728)
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

kiss my feet:

Stop using commands and start using files… If you want to setrights to somebody to do it through player.java and not setrights x playername.

I hope you aren’t saying to set them based upon Username instead.

Read full topic

item.title: Un-tradeable items (player to player trading) Demote (667 loadin 728)
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

Usually servers have an array of items you cannot trade

and what do you mean? when you use a command? your being too vague in your explanation.

edit: sorry i didn’t see you were using a 667 im not familiar with that protocol things may be different, my apologies
